sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"小心的，谨慎的"之意。
means: careful ： 侧重做事谨慎、留心，特别注意一些细节地方。
cautious ： 着重考虑事情的后果，谨慎留意，防止出差错。
attentive ： 指认真地注意地倾听别人的意见，留心别人的需要等。
prudent ： 指遇事审慎，思考计划周密，不贸然行事。

sentence.Network_en: Tone down your kamikaze tendencies and take more prudent risks.
sentence.Network_cn: 别那么玩命，冒险时要谨慎些。

sentence.Network_en: Prudent people are not going to take a leap in the dark.
sentence.Network_cn: 小心谨慎的人是不会轻易冒险的。

sentence.Network_en: It might be more prudent to get a second opinion before going ahead.
sentence.Network_cn: 行动之前再征求一下意见也许更为慎重。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... prudence 谨慎 prudent 谨慎的 prune 修剪.
王玉梅托福词汇 Word_list_30_在线英语听力室 ... provocation 激怒，挑拨，刺激 prudent 审慎的，深谋远虑的 wary,cautious 词组.
大学英语六级高频词汇表 ... provoke vt. 激怒,惹起,驱使 prudent adj. 审慎的,三思而后行的,精明的,节俭的 pulley n. 滑轮,滑车.
新概念第三册精解 ... careful 细心的 （不表示谨慎） prudent 慎重的 wary 小心翼翼的.

list.abs: ...国劳工部对《雇员退休收入保障法》关于养老金投资的“谨慎人”（Prudent Man）条款做出新的解释，在不危及整个投资组合安全性 …
其中，最重要的变化是美国劳工部关于雇员退休收入保障法案中的"谨慎的人"（prudent man）条款所作的修改。这一条款曾要求养老 …
we need to continue to follow a prudent fiscal policy ., 继续实行稳健的财政政策.
We will continue to follow a prudent monetary policy ., 继续实行稳健的货币政策.
义务之程度以「审慎人(prudent person)」为标准，而其内容

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin prudent-, contraction of provident- 'foreseeing, attending to' (see provident)

entry.def: Someone who is prudent is sensible and careful.

example.ex: It is always prudent to start any exercise programme gradually at first...
example.tran: 刚开始一项锻炼计划时循序渐进总是明智的。

example.ex: Being a prudent and cautious person, you realise that the problem must be resolved.
example.tran: 慎重小心的人都会意识到这个问题非解决不可。

means.word_mean: 1. careful and sensible; marked by sound judgment;

sentences.sentence: "more prudent to hide than to fight"

means.word_mean: 2. showing wise self-restraint in speech and behavior especially in preserving prudent silence;

auth_sentence.content: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blindly taking initial withdrawal plus inflation is not prudent.

auth_sentence.content: I did not see it as a prudent investment.
auth_sentence.res_content: I did not see it as a prudent investment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I did not see it as a prudent investment.

auth_sentence.content: Singapore itself offers a model for prudent water policy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Singapore itself offers a model for prudent water policy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Singapore itself offers a model for prudent water policy.

means.word_mean: 审慎的; 有先见之明的; 判断力强的

sentences.en: A prudent man saves part of his wages.
sentences.cn: 深谋远虑的人会将一部分工资存起来。

jushi.english: A prudent man saves part of his wages.
jushi.chinese: 深谋远虑的人储蓄一部分工资。
